regen.absent_element: the ability to provide log information via the graphical interface
regen.new_specification: The MultiMahjongServer will provide log information through its graphical user interface for the administrator
The MultiMahjongServer shall manage and store logs for gameplay and administrative actions, enabling review and analysis of game activities.

regen.absent_element: absence of log management and review process
regen.new_specification: The MultiMahjongServer should log gameplay session details and provide tools for the administrator to review and manage these logs for analysis.

label: The MultiMahjongServer will have a graphical user interface with which the administrator can get log information.
absence: getting log information by administrator through a graphical user interface
